cardData.title: Pocket WIFI
cardData.description: Stay connected on the go with our high-speed Pocket WIFI. Perfect for travel and remote work.

cardData.title: Router
cardData.description: Experience seamless and reliable internet connectivity at home with our advanced routers.

cardData.title: SIM/eSIM
cardData.description: Get instant connectivity with our SIM and eSIM options, suitable for all your devices.

customerTestimonial.sectionSubHeading: Discover what our valued customers have to say about their experiences with our services

testimonials.description: Using this eSIM service for the past six months has completely transformed our approach to managing connectivity for our projects!
testimonials.author: Sarah Johnson

testimonials.description: This platform has been a game-changer for our international projects, making it easier to stay connected without the usual hassles.
testimonials.author: Michael Lee

testimonials.description: The ease of use and flexibility offered by this service has allowed us to focus on what matters mostâ€”our work!
testimonials.author: Emily Davis

testimonials.description: We've seen significant cost savings since switching to this eSIM solution. It's a smart choice for any business working globally.
testimonials.author: James Taylor

testimonials.description: Reliable connectivity is crucial for us, and this service has delivered beyond our expectations. Highly recommended!
testimonials.author: Sophia Martinez

howItWorksData.title: How To Rent
howItWorksData.description: Stay connected with Yoowifi in just 3 simple steps! Download the app, choose your destination, and select the package that fits your needs.

howItWorksData.title: How To Return
howItWorksData.description: Choose easy returns with Singpost drop-off or visit locations islandwide for hassle-free service.

howItWorksData.title: Pickup & Drop Off Locations
howItWorksData.description: With 20+ pick-up and drop-off locations, we make it easy for you to get your pocket wifi and stay connected hassle-free.

downloadYooWifi.ctaText: Advanced features for an effortless digital experience anytime, anywhere!
